name.en: Etraynze the Sprinting Shadow Flower Ninja
name.ja: <ruby>花<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>牙<rt>げ</rt></ruby><ruby>疾<rt>しっ</rt></ruby><ruby>走<rt>そう</rt></ruby>のクノイチ・エトランゼ

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Etraynze the Shadow Flower Ninja" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This turn, this card's name becomes "Etraynze the Shadow Flower Ninja". Then, if you activated this effect during your Main Phase that you Normal or Special Summoned this card, you can add up to 2 EARTH Attribute Plant Type Normal Monsters from your Graveyard to your hand.
